name: Raizin Ping Pong
overview:
This first ever virtual ping-pong game for the arcade can be played by one or two players.

Set in a variety of backgrounds from the street to a disco, select a character from among ten choices, each with their own special plays such as excellent spinning ball tactics, fast driving balls or a balanced mix. When playing, use one of two realistic paddles with built in sensors which are attached to the unit. These paddles allow for all kinds of moves, from backhand to forehand and beyond.

Complete numerous levels, battling a range of characters whose skill levels increase progressively.
Funky hip-hop music plays in the background to set the tone of the streets.
